post.title: Tutorials that i recommend
post.excerpt: I will share with you tutorials that helped me when i started learning .NET framework
post.content:
First of all that you must to absorb is Jeffrey Richter's book "CLR via C#"

I really recommend Mosh Hamedani's cources

For russian-speaking readaers i want to recommend a METANIT

comment.author: Hate Speech
comment.content: WHAT A HECK DUDE? In your own blog you must create your OWN tutorials, but NOT REFER TO EXISTING ONES!!!!!
